Nerangs.ab: ō ī gāh ī ātrawaxšān šudan war ī ō ī ātaxšgāh ud barsom kardan aṣ̌əm vōhū sē guftan
He should go to the place of the ātrawaxš and recite three aṣ̌əm vōhū facing the ātaxšgāh and the barsom.

ō ī gāh ī ātrawaxš šawēd war ō ī ātaxšgāh ud barsom kardan xšnaōϑra. ahurahe. mazdā̊.: aṣ̌əm vohū ēk yaθā ahū vairiiō haft guftan xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊.: aṣ̌əm vohū ēk nəmasə.tē ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe hudā̊ mazišta yazata xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ : aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan

He goes to the place of the ātrawaxš, facing the ātaxšgāh and the barsom and recite xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ and one aṣ̌əm vohū, seven yaθā ahū vairiiō, further xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ and one aṣ̌əm vohū, then nəmasə.tē ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe hudā̊ mazišta yazata xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three aṣ̌əm vohū.

Quotations.ab: pad ān sē aṣ̌əm vohū gōspand ān gyāg abāyēd ka andar nayēd ā be nē nayišn zōt ka andar †ō yazišn āyēd az kust ī dašn pad gāh ī ātarwaxšān be estišn u-š war ō ātaxš ud barsom rōn kunišn aṣ̌əm vohū sē

"During those three Aṣ̌əm Vohū the sacrificial animal must be there; if he leads it, he should not lead it. When the zōt goes to the yazišn, he has to stay at the right side, at the place of the ātrawaxš, facing the fire and the barsom and (he has to recite) three Aṣ̌əm Vohū.
